item.title: Contact Us
item.description: Have a query? Need help. We are here to help you out.

item.title: Words of a Feather
item.description: If you consider words to be your armor and weaponry in a lone field of chaos, you're in for a spin as a significant chunk of your artillery is not yours to choose.

item.title: The Man From Amorium
item.description: To test your creative juices and verbal expertise, you shall be supplied with the shell of a storyline; your job is to craft it into a story, and tell it in your way.

item.title: Dear Diary
item.description: We all know half-completed stories are more exasperating than even complete stories with lousy endings.

item.title: JAM - Just a Minute
item.description: JAM is an out and out fun event which has your heads rolling over your tongue.

item.title: Sherlocked
item.description: Time is of the essence as the murderer in this fast-paced investigative drama, as you need to catch the killer within 3 hours

item.title: Debate
item.description: 'It is better to debate a question without settling it than to settle a question without debating it'

item.title: Spell Bee
item.description: Did something in the previous sentence annoy you? If yes, then here's chance to make the most of your obsession with spelling.

item.title: The Devil's Advocate
item.description: A group of participants are made to discuss on a topic or subject for a limited time and assessed accordingly.

item.title: Group Discussion
item.description: A group of participants are made to discuss on a topic or subject for a limited time and assessed accordingly.

item.title: Picture Perspective
item.description: It is well known that everyone is an artist. All we need is a trigger to spark the artist hidden inside every one of us to blaze into existence.

item.title: Lit Quiz
item.description: Do you love the enchanting world of literature? Do you feel the dusty old volumes calling out to you?
